QuestData.Title: Somethin' for the Boys
QuestData.Description: Cleaned up the camp and ran errands for Forgehammer? Not bad for a wee $C. Take these to Iain at Firebeard Cemetery, and he should reward you for a job well done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Forgehammer's weapons to Iain Firebeard at the Firebeard Cemetery.
QuestData.RewardText: Hah! Looks like their raid went mighty well then. I'll have to buy ol' Forgehammer a round once we finish with this mess.
